about_the_game:
DECAYED is an open-world post apocalyptic singleplayer survival game.

Taking the place of a Green Beret, you will single-handedly witness the world fall, following the events of a failed search and rescue mission. Barely making it out with your life, you will witness pure chaos unfold, as you soon find yourself within an undead hellscape.

FIGHT THE UNDEAD


Choose your own battles. Come out weapons blazing, using your tactical skills and whits to make your way through the undead, or hunker down and protect an area, standing your ground.

OPEN WORLD


Explore the world with absolute freedom. Stay in the city and loot buildings, homes, or bases for powerful items, or stay secluded in a forest, with the decreased abundance of threats. There are zero restrictions by missions or NPC's. You are your own commander now.

FORTIFY AND CRAFT


Fortify your post, and craft medical, lethal, or useful tools that you will use to defend your yourself or fight with. You have more than just the dead to worry about.

DYNAMIC SEASONS


Experience the hardships of changing weather and seasons, from freezing temperatures and scarce amounts of food in the winter, to a warm summer evening, with a higher abundance of the dead roaming the streets. You must adapt to these changes to survive.
